title: Motta Paiyyan Paiyyan Lyrics Motta Shiva Ketta Shiva
stanzas:
Motta Paiyyan Paiyyan Lyrics Motta Shiva Ketta Shiva Song Lyrics
#AmareshGanesh #RaghavaLawrence #Suchitra

Motta paiyyan paiyyan paiyyan
ketta paiyyan paiyyan paiyyan

Motta paiyyan
ketta paiyyan
aala madakkittaan
thittam pottu
figure-a ippa
thatti thookkittan
haiyayyo..haiyayyo..
haiyayyo..haiyayyo..

locall ivan massu
ivan classu mixudaa
makkal super starunu
peru veppendaa
haiyayyo..haiyayyo..

style-a vandhu ninna
aiyye pudikkalanu sonna
massaa vandhu ninna
ippa I love you sonna

soppu sundharai
soppana sundhari
oadi puttaanga
yen kanavu sundhari
enkitta maattikittaanga
haiyayyo..haiyayyo..

Motta paiyyan paiyyan paiyyan
ketta paiyyan paiyyan paiyyan
Motta motta

inbangal alli allli
kaetkaamal kodukiraai
ondrundrum solli solli
ne seigiraai (2)

ne nijamaai vazhgiraaye
nizhalai verukkirai
adhiga anbai kaatti
rasikka vaikkiraai

unnodu konjipesa
en ullam nerungudhu
kannaala kadhal veesi
thallaaduthu (2)

unmoochu kaatril naane
prandhu pogiren
un udhadu pattathaale
naan urugi pogiren

Motta paiyyan paiyyan paiyyan
ketta paiyyan paiyyan paiyyan
motta motta..
